decisions.description: Checks whether a relevant permission set assignment was found to allow user to perform a calibration.

decisions.description: Checks if Serialised Product and Location record types are found.
decisions.name: Check_Record_Types_Found
decisions.label: Check Record Types Found

decisions.description: Checks if the permission set assignment was found, if found means user has authorisation to run an inspection, if not, user does not have authorisation. Also checks to make sure that permission sets were found and are in the system.
decisions.name: Decide_If_Running_User_Authorised
decisions.label: Decide If Running User Authorised

decisions.description: Checks if the new item status is unserviceable, if it is, the end of life flow will be invoked.
decisions.name: End_Of_Life_Needed
decisions.label: End Of Life Needed?

decisions.description: Checks if the new item status is unserviceable, if it is, the end of life flow will be invoked.
decisions.name: End_Of_Life_Needed_Failed_Inventory_Check
decisions.label: End Of Life Needed?

decisions.description: Checks to see if any inventory items failed inventory check.
decisions.name: Failures_Present
decisions.label: Failures Present?

decisions.description: Performs an initial check on the Serialised Product to see if this is part of a Multiset kit.

decisions.description: Checks whether a relevant permission set assignment was found to allow user to perform an inspection.

decisions.name: Inventory_Check_Authorised

rules.name: Full_Inventory_Check_Dates_Authorised

decisions.description: If invoked via quick action, checks to ensure the Serialised Product is active, additionally checks if its an active item that the status is not booked out, lost/damaged or unserviceable

decisions.description: Checks to ensure the Serialised Product status is not booked out, lost/damaged or unserviceable

decisions.description: Checks to ensure the Serialised Product status is not booked out, lost/damaged or unserviceable

decisions.description: Decision to check if items were found, if the get records in previous step returned null records, screen will display to notify the user.

decisions.description: Checks what type of location has been picked by the user.

formulas.description: Stores todays date for checking that the expected return date entered by user isn't earlier than today.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to User that the Calibration has now been logged.

screens.label: Calibration Confirmation

fields.name: CalibrationCompleteDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Thanks for logging a Calibration. Please select 'Finish' to add it to the system.

screens.description: Screen for user to log updates to safety check dates on the serialised product object.
screens.name: calibration_Date_Update_Screen
screens.label: Calibration Date Update Screen

fields.name: DateChangeDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Please select any dates you wish to change and enter the new date, this will be updated for you on the equipment:

validationRule.errorMessage: The new date cannot be in the past.
The new date cannot be in the past.

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Location is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_Location_Record_Type_Screen
screens.label: Missing Location Record Type Screen

fields.name: MissingLocationRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
An inspection cannot be logged at this time. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Location object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that the system is missing permission sets, these need to be uploaded before an inspection is logged in the system for authorisation checks.
screens.name: Missing_Permission_Sets_Screen
screens.label: Missing Permission Sets Screen

fields.name: MissingPermissionSetsDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
There are missing permissions in the system to check you are authorised to run an inspection. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue:


One of the below custom permissions are missing in the Salesforce system:

  • Competent User
  • Competent User Contractor
  • Compliance Team
  • Operational Safety Engineer
  • Site Manager
  • Team Leader

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Product Transfers is missing from the system.

screens.label: Missing Product Transfer Record Type Screen

fields.name: MissingProductTransferRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
An inspection cannot be logged at this time. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Product Transfer object:


  • Compliance Stores

fields.name: UnavailableDisplayText

variables.description: Stores the serialised product Id where the flow has been invoked from.
